templateOptions.label: ComputerName
templateOptions.description: The name of the server where the SkypeForBusiness software is installed

templateOptions.label: UserName
templateOptions.description: The UserName that has administrative rights to logon to the remote computer and right to manage SkypeForBusiness

templateOptions.label: Password
templateOptions.description: The password for the administrative user

templateOptions.label: RegistrarPool
templateOptions.description: The name of Registrar pool where the user's Skype for Business Server account will be stored.

templateOptions.label: EnterPriseVoiceEnabled
templateOptions.description: Allows users to make telephone calls using the Internet rather than using the standard telephone network.

templateOptions.label: ExchangeArchivingPolicy
templateOptions.description: Indicates where the user's instant messaging sessions are archived
